```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
pacman::p_load('ggplot2', 'plotly')
```

#look at year, state, pesticide, carcinogen, bee toxin
what pesticides do each state use and how toxic are they?

```{r}
Cali<- ggplot(california) + geom_point(aes( x= Carcinogen, y= Pesticide )) + labs(title= 'California')
ggplotly(Cali)
```
```{r}
Florida <- ggplot(florida) + geom_point(aes( x= Carcinogen, y= Pesticide )) + labs(title= 'Florida')
ggplotly(Florida)
```

```{r}
Wash <- ggplot(washington) + geom_point(aes( x= Carcinogen, y= Pesticide )) + labs(title= 'Washington')
ggplotly(Wash)
```
